summary: VEHICLE AT 36500 MILES THE PASSENGER SIDE SLIDING DOOR BUZZING WHEN STARTING OR LOCKING VEHICLE. UPON VISITING THE LOCAL DODGE DEALERSHIP WAS INFORMED THAT THE DOOR ACTUATOR WAS DEFECTIVE AND WOULD COST APPROXIMATELY 300 TO 500 TO REPAIR. THE FULL DODGE WARRANTY ENDED AT 36000 MILES. THE DOOR WILL NOT LOCK. AUTOMATICALLY THIS IS A SERIOUS FLAW AND RISK TO OCCUPANT WHILE DRIVING IF THE DOORS ARE NOT VERIFIED MANUALLY LOCKED. THIS IS A RISK FOR CHILDREN, IN THE EVENT OF AN ACCIDENT, LOCATED IN THE CENTER SEATS OF THE VEHICLE WHILE OPERATING.
